TEXT.TITLE: SOUTHLAND <SLC> UNIT RAISES CRUDE PRICES
TEXT.BODY:
Southland Corp's Citgo Petrleum Corp said it raised the contract price it will pay for all grades of crude oil by one dlr a barrel, effective today. The increase brings Citgo's posted price for West Texas Intermediate to 17.00 dlrs a bbl. West Texas Sour is also now priced at 17.00 dlrs/bbl, and Light Louisiana South is posted at 17.35 dlrs/bbl. On February 25 Citgo lowered its crude postings 50 cts to 1.50 dlrs per bbl, and cut WTI one dlr to 16.00.
Reuter
